mapper.select: select * from SGMW where (id=(select MAX(id) from ScglXD))
select * from SGMW where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2})
mapper.insert: insert into SGMW( String name,Integer safe,Integer production,Integer lzc,Float quality,Integer personnel,String energyConsumption,Float equipment) values(#{name},#{safe},#{production},#{workingHours},#{lzc},#{quality},#{personnel},#{energyConsumption},#{equipment})
